abstract: A glimmer of optimism about the nation’s banks sparked a rally but many experts warned that it could be short-lived.
snippet: A glimmer of optimism about the nation’s banks sparked a rally but many experts warned that it could be short-lived.
lead_paragraph: Hopes that maybe, just maybe, the nation’s beleaguered banks are on the mend swept Wall Street on Tuesday, unleashing a breathtaking stock market rally that left investors a bit giddy but had many experts warning that this rally, like so many before it, could falter as fast as it began.

headline.main: In a Switch, Citigroup Lifts Stocks
headline.print_headline: In a Switch, Citigroup Lifts Stocks

byline.original: By Eric Dash and Jack Healy
